articles.description: The beekeeper, who has helped to look after the insects for well over a decade, said that he was not aware that informing the bees of the Queen's death was part of his role.
articles.content:
The royal beekeeper has taken part in a peculiar ancient tradition by telling bees that the Queen has died. 
 It is understood that the bees were informed of the change from Elizabeth II to Charles … [+4293 chars]

articles.content:

articles.author: Lizzie May
articles.title: Thousands more grieving and tearful Britons head to Buckingham Palace, Windsor and Balmoral - Daily Mail
articles.description: Members of the public have continued to gather at the gates of royal residences of the United Kingdom this morning with hundreds of bouquets, personal notes and candles left in her honour.
articles.content: Great Britain is united in grief following the death of Her Majesty The Queen, with tens of thousands of people seen flocking to Buckingham Palace to pay their respects ahead of King Charles III bein… [+16060 chars]
